original: intros. intros i_lt_n. unfold "⇧". unfold sum_powers. rewrite msum_ext with (g := (fun j : nat => (f i j) * power (e i j) r)). * unfold msum. assert (forall j : nat, j < i < n -> f i j < r) as Hf' by (intros; apply Hf; lia). assert (forall j1 j2 : nat, j1 < j2 < n -> e i j1 = e i j2 -> j1 = j2) as He' by (intros; apply He; lia). assert (r <> 0) as r_not_zero by (lia). specialize (sum_powers_bound r i (f i) (e i) r_not_zero Hf' He'). intros. rewrite H. reflexivity. * intros j. reflexivity.
